thread.title: Katy Perry Announces GRAMMYs Performance, Continues to Rock Blonde Hair: 'New Life Who Dis'
thread.title_full: Katy Perry Announces GRAMMYs Performance, Continues to Rock Blonde Hair: 'New Life Who Dis'

author: Rachel McRady
title: Katy Perry Announces GRAMMYs Performance, Continues to Rock Blonde Hair: 'New Life Who Dis'
text: Katy Perry Announces GRAMMYs Performance, Continues to Rock Blonde Hair: ‘New Life Who Dis’ by Rachel McRady 4:11 AM PST, February 07, 2017 Photo: Instagram New ‘do, new gig! Katy Perry is ready to embrace her “new life.” The 32-year-old pop star shared a pic of her new blonde hair while wearing a light pink ensemble. “New life who dis,” she captioned the pic. A photo posted by KATY PERRY (@katyperry) on Feb 6, 2017 at 6:52pm PST She also retweeted an announcement from the Recording Academy, saying, “CONFIRMED: @katyperry returns to the #GRAMMYS stage. Don’t miss her performance on Music’s Biggest Night Feb. 12 on @CBS!” This performance could likely be the start of a musical comeback for Perry who is currently working on her fifth studio album. She hasn’t released any new music since her 2016 Summer Olympics anthem “Rise.” The “Roar” singer, who performed at the Super Bowl halftime show in 2015, showed her support for Lady Gaga this past Sunday. A photo posted by KATY PERRY (@katyperry) on Jan 21, 2017 at 6:37pm PST She tweeted, “Rooting for you @ladygaga! You got this! #LittleMonsters.” For more of the celebrity support at the Super Bowl, watch the clip below! RELATED SLIDESHOW
